title: Voice Feedback Customization
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to have the ability to customize voice feedback mechanisms so that I can create engaging and accessible interactions for elderly users that resonate with their needs and preferences.

title: Customizable User Profiles for Enhanced Interaction
summary: As a developer, I want to create customizable user profiles that remember user preferences and past interactions so that I can design more engaging and user-friendly applications for elderly users and caregivers.

title: Contextual Reminders for Elderly Users
summary: As a developer, I want to implement contextual reminders that can be triggered by real-time health data so that elderly users receive timely notifications and support from caregivers.

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to seamlessly integrate real-time health data from wearable sensors into ALFRED so that I can create timely notifications for caregivers and enhance the quality of life for elderly users.

title: Adaptive Learning for User Engagement
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to implement adaptive learning algorithms that personalize user interactions for elderly users, so that they can engage more effectively with the ALFRED system and receive tailored support in real time.
